Meanwhile for itself on the heels should be the enemy unaware of fear and pity the most unimaginable nightmare-the Wild Hunt, a cavalcade of ghostly riders, harbingers of doom and death, capable for only one night does not leave a trace of entire settlements.

"The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt" offers non-linear, adult, rich history and unmatched combat system without using the QTE, which combines a wide range of tactical elements inherent in RPGs with dynamic and spectacular battles worthy of the best games of the genre action.
